title: Strictly's Craig Revel Horwood left red-faced for mocking Anton's 'fake teeth'
text:

Strictly Come Dancing's Tess Daly burst into a fit of laughter after judge Craig Revel Horwood mocked Anton's "fake teeth".

The presenter couldn't hold back her giggling after the ordeal, and continued to do so as Craig was giving feedback to Anton.

A harsh Craig said to Anton: "I slightly was distracted with the wig I have to say, and the fake teeth that you have in."

And Tess was lost in laughter before she turned and asked Anton: "They're not fake, are they?" then moved to Craig: "They’re all his own teeth, just clarified that."

The other judges appeared to be shocked by Craig's cheeky comment, as he himself was left red-faced.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

Anton's dance partner EastEnders actress Emma Barton put her hand to her chest and looked shocked, as the other judges helplessly turned to each other confirming that his teeth were "not fake".

Shirley Ballas told Craig: "They're not fake teeth, they're his own teeth," while Bruno shouted across at him: "They're his own teeth!"

And Craig looked shell-shocked as he asked "are they?" as his fellow judges laughed at his embarrassing comment live on air.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

Tess then admitted it was "slightly embarrassing" as Craig apologised for mocking Anton.

But the professional dancer seemed to laugh it off as he turned to face the audience and mouthed something about Craig.

Judge Motsi added: "Now we know - the teeth are real guys, that has been cleared!" and she turned to speak to Emma about their routine, with Tess still in heaps of laughter.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

Motsi was cut short as judges were staring elsewhere, and she said: "Are we still looking at the teeth?" which set the crowd and Tess off again.

The Strictly host then thanked the judges and laughed: "They really brought the teeth into that didn't they?"

It seems it will be a moment that will go down in the show's history.
description: Tess Daly burst into hysterics as Craig was certain Anton had 'fake teeth'
